fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Investigate a player, learning their exact role.
- Prepare a Strike on a player. Strikes will activate the following morning.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Detection immune players will show up as a random Town role.
- If a player who was investigated or Striked last night is hanged, a Strike is gained and you may take two actions the following night.
- If two or more Striked players are alive, you gain basic defense.
